channel.title: Programmer Notes
channel.description: This is mostly concerned with programming.

item.title: Markdown Test
item.description:
This is a test of the markdown capabilities.
[this is a line]
List :
+ item 1
+ item 2
This is added to the last item
line1. line2. line3. These are four lines, which s/b one paragraph.
This is a line, after one empty line.
This is the next line , after two new lines.
This is a line, followed by 3 spaces.
The preceding line has a few spaces. This line I finish with a few spaces.
This is the line after 2 new lines (starts a new paragraph) This is after 3 new lines.
This is after three "white space" lines
This is after one white space line

item.title: CL-BLIKY
item.description: I 'm writing this using a self rolled blog engine called cl-bliky. I'm indebted to an excellent [tutorial](http://roeim.net/vetle/docs/cl-webapp-intro/) put together by [Vetle Roeim](http://roeim.net/vetle/). Vetle's goal was obviously to put together a compelling tutorial and he succeeded. I had different goals.
